rules_text: Swordsman’s Cleave deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If you control a modified creature, Swordsman’s Cleave deals 5 damage to that creature instead. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]

OG_1:
Swordsman’s Cleave deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If you control a modified creature, exile that creature instead.
